alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:26PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pushmataha, southern Latimer and southern Le Flore Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Mountain Fork to 4 miles south of Whitesboro to 2 miles west of Nashoba. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Heavener... Talihina... Fanshawe... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Talimena State Park... Bengal... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Big Cedar... Lake Wister State Park... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Muse... Sardis... Summerfield... Heavener Runestone Park... Hodgen... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
